item.title: Date histogram aggregation
item.description: Date histogram aggregation # This multi-bucket aggregation is similar to the normal histogram, but it can only be used with date or date range values. Because dates are represented internally in Elasticsearch as long values, it is possible, but not as accurate, to use the normal histogram on dates as well. The main difference in the two APIs is that here the interval can be specified using date/time expressions. Time-based data requires special support because time-based intervals are not always a fixed length.
